mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PET(ID, MEMBER_ID, PET_IMAGE, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTER, PET_VET) VALUES(SEQ_PET.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{petImage}, #{petName}, #{petKind}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, #{petBirth}, #{petWeight}, #{petNeuter}, #{petVet})
